workflow.title: Instance Selection and Prototype Based Rules Example 6
workflow.description: Example of Instance optimization using LVQ algorithm for training kNN classifier (Requires Instance Selection and Prototype Based Rules): Here we use FCM clustering to initialize LVQ network. The "Class assigner" is responsible for assigning class label for each cluster center, then obtained ExampleSet is used as codebooks initialization in the LVQ operator, which on the Prototype (Pro) output delivers the new optimized position of codebooks (prototypes) for training nearest neighbor classifier.
